resources.string: 1. Go to Settings > Bluetooth\n 2. Pair with your Bluetooth Module (HC-05, HC-06 etc)

1. On The Next Page. Register With your Username And Password.
 2. Remember this Username and Password.
 3. Click On Register.

1. You Will Be Able to See a List Of Paired Devices.
 2. Click On Your Bluetooth Module.
 3. The Screen Now showing, will display the value That You Will Enter remotely. Inital Value is 0.

1. Go to http://elabsiot.000webhostapp.com/ on your browser. 
2. Enter the same username and password(Case Sensitive) and hit VERIFY.
 3. A textField will open. Enter Your desired Value that you want to transmit.
